2587.name: Unknown
2587.message:
The Nintendo Network ID you entered
already exists.

If you want to use this ID, select "Link a
Nintendo Network ID" in User Settings,
and follow the on-screen instructions.

During the process, select "Yes" when
asked "Do you have a Nintendo Network
ID?" You will need to enter the e-mail
address and password used when you
initially created the ID.
